sourcesContent:
<template>
<v-container>
	<v-row v-for="(timePeriods, index) in periodsInThrees" :key="index">
		<v-col cols="12" md="6" color="purple" v-for="(period, index) in time_periods" :key="index">
			<time-periods  :header="period.header" :subtopics="period.subtopics" />
		</v-col>

	</v-row>
</v-container>
</template>



<script>
// @ is an alias to /src
import timePeriods from '@/components/TimePeriods.vue'
import  { db } from '@/main'
export default {
	name:'Home',
	components: { 
		timePeriods //translated to time-periods tage
	},
	data() { 
		return {
			time_periods: []
		}
	},
	computed:{
		periodsInThrees() {
			return this._.chunk(this.time_periods, 2);
		}
	},
	mounted() {
		this.getEvents();
	},
	methods: {
		async getEvents(){
			var timeperiods = [];
			var timeperiod = {};
			let snapshot = await db.collection('time_periods').get();
			snapshot.forEach (doc => {
				let appDate = doc.data();
				this.time_periods.push(appDate);
				
			});
		}
			// ********** THIS is for searching a doc.id -- use to to create a collection and search the collection ids
				// var docRef = db.collection("TimePeriods").doc(x);
				// docRef.get().then(function(doc) {
				//     if (doc.exists) {
				//         console.log("Document data:", doc.data());
				//     } else {
				//         // doc.data() will be undefined in this case
				//         console.log("No such document!");
				//     }
				// }).catch(function(error) {
				//     console.log("Error getting document:", error);
				// });
			// ******** THIS is for searching a doc
				// if (appDate[x]){
				// 	console.log("hey");
				// }
			// ********* THIS is for getting a substopic
				// let snapshot2 = await db.collection('TimePeriods').doc('TimePeriod2').collection('subtopics').get();
			
	}
};
</script>
